website_summaries.verdict: This vase is a gorgeous option for accenting a room with faux flowers but won't work for fresh flowers. Great for short-term decorating purposes, too.
pros: We like this ceramic flower vase for gifting for special occasions like showers or weddings, thanks to the traditional white glaze and elegantly-textured pattern
12-inch height works well for long stems
cons: Requires a liner to use with water for fresh flowers
However, it's a beautiful vessel for silk arrangements
A few reports of damage or breakage upon delivery

customer_reviews.title: I reordered it!!!
customer_reviews.text: It's gorgeous! My house is French farmhouse decor and this was exactly the vase I was looking for! It's big and beautiful in person. I loved it so much I ordered a second one the moment I got it out of the box!
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging- came shattered.
customer_reviews.text: This came shattered so u don’t know what it would have been like in real life. As soon as o got the box and heard the broken ceramic I didn’t bother opening it. Didn’t take my chance ordering again and bought a vase from Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Gulliver

customer_reviews.title: I love this vase
customer_reviews.text: I love this vase! It is very simple with dainty texture and is true white! The vase has a nice heft to it and looks more expensive than it was.
customer_reviews.author: Se'

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful vase
customer_reviews.text: I loved this vase as soon as I opened it! Came securely packaged. The textured design adds a nice touch. It'll go with a large variety of flowers. I was looking for a medium sized vase (check sizing) and this is absolutely perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon shopper

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special, but it’s the height I needed.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a plain white vase that was 12” tall and this is. It’s nothing special, and I’d have preferred a smooth surface. It is not meant to hold water, so be aware of that.

customer_reviews.title: Great service. Item as described.

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good looking vase
customer_reviews.text: I have been eyeing this vase for a while. It came back in stock and it came today. This is a very good looking vase. Looks a little expensive. Don't be fooled about the size, Its larger than you think. It is also detailed very well. Some things are a hit or miss, well this is a hit.

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!

customer_reviews.title: Love it!

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the mantle

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!

customer_reviews.title: Unusable flower vases!
customer_reviews.text: The 2 vases arrived in perfect condition. The only problem is that I had ordered them to use for flower arrangements for church. If you read what's written on the bottom of the vase, it states that they can not be used with water. A flower vase that can't be used to hold water? Really?! Too bad I had already thrown the packing materials away. They would definitely be going back. Do not buy if you want to actually USE the vase as a VASE! Now I am stuck with these things.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Sterett

customer_reviews.title: I think I would've really enjoyed these. Very disappointing

customer_reviews.title: LOVE! The price is right and the vase is ...
customer_reviews.text: LOVE! The price is right and the vase is even more beautiful in person, whats not to love! I bought this for my nightstands because I was tired of the boring old lamp decor and wanted to try something different, one of them has a few dings in them but I flipped it to the back to hide it and paired it with a small little orchid plant in a vase next to this one and its beautiful! I am not putting any flowers in but using it as is for now but be warned this vase says it cant hold water without a liner.

customer_reviews.title: tall enough to hold those very long stemmed flowers

I ordered this Friday 5/11 and she received it the next day Saturday 5/12--that kind of delivery is unbelievable--thanks to all workers involved and the artist of the lovely vase!!

customer_reviews.title: Odd warning label
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice design, and a nice, unique shape, but for some reason the sticker at the bottom says "not for use with water, only with liner" or something like that, which doesn't make sense since it's a flower vase. I put flowers directly in the vase with water and so far no ill effects but I'm not sure what that warning was about.

product_meta.title: Hosley 12 Inch High White Textured Ceramic Vase Ideal Gift for Weddings Party Home Spa Settings Reiki O3
product_meta.description: Hosley's 12" High White Textured Ceramic Vase Add style to your home's decor .Measures: 5.4" L x 5.4" W x 12" H. For decorative use only.
feature_bullets: PRODUCT: Hosley's 12" High White Textured Ceramic Vase
USE: Great for adding a decorative touch to any room's decor. Wonderful accent piece for coffee tables or side tables. Perfect for everyday use, wedding, events, aromatherapy,Spa, Reiki, Meditation.
BENEFITS: It can accent your home or office for the right decor with or without floral or greenery additions. Must use liner if used with fresh flowers.
MEASUREMENTS/MATERIAL: Each one measures 5.4" L x 5.4" W x 12" H and ceramic.

HOSLEY BRAND PRODUCTS: Hosley brand products are made from quality raw materials with minimal wastage at every step of production. With the goal of achieving a neutral carbon footprint, please recycle and help leave Mother Earth better off for future generations.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars258 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
